name: Time is Money (Doctor Inin)
description:
Welcome in the Chronoworld.

Time is Money is a game made for  polish "Grarantanna" game jam.

It's a fast paced platformer game with "hand-drawn" graphics, dynamic camera and interesting music. In this game your lifetime is limited, fortunetly, here in the Chronoworld time is a currency,  so why not to try earning some money?

Open chests and sell your rare items to the Trader, who will gladly accept all items you've gathered. ...Or for a better price - sell the items to the professionals, who at this very time need their rare artifacts. 

The Smith - Needs Silver Horseshoes, from which he's going to extract legendary minerals.

The Druids - Will accept Leaves of Souls in their tent. They need those for their experiments.

And lastly - The Marauders - Marauders looove gold. That's what they're willing to pay for.

Opening chests, Selling things, and even being alive for a second will give you points! Beat your highscores, but watch out... the higher your score is, the more time it will take for a chest to appear!

  Some computers might have an issue that can block the game because of Windows Defender. When that happends, just click "Show more informations" and "Run anyway". Have Fun!
